text:
ሰላም ሰላም all
With more than a 1000 volunteers in this amazing team and thousands more elsewhere innovating to combat COVID in ET, we are planning to assemble all efforts and set up a go-to spot for reference on anyone “noteworthy” that works on COVID. We want to assemble and recognize efforts on a public link such as this one <http://pmo.gov.et/corona/efforts|pmo.gov.et/corona/efforts> to be eventually moved to <http://efforts.covid19.et|efforts.covid19.et> ...
If you want to support in collecting data for this project, i.e. scour news outlets, the internet, social media etc… and populate the attached spreadsheet

text:
The AfDB Innovation and Entrepreneurship Lab is organising the #AfricaVsVirus Challenge as an opportunity to create tech and non-tech solutions to tackle some of the most pressing challenges created by the coronavirus pandemic. We are calling on socially committed citizens worldwide, problem solvers, creative minds, health experts, programmers, graphic and web-designers to come together in a 72-hour digital collaborative process to bring about ground-breaking solutions addressing some of the social and economic challenges posed by the coronavirus.

Following the #AfricaVsVirus Challenge the best ideas/solutions will be selected and will be fully implemented with partners and donors in Africa and worldwide. 

20 ideas will be selected to participate in the Seedstars Investment Readiness Program, a one month educational program that will further support the ideas in getting to MVP. In addition, the top 3 ideas will be eligible for over 50K USD in in-kind prizes and other prizes to help further support their idea. 

Interested? To submit your idea visit this LINK and get more information.
Deadline for submission of your idea is APRIL 15TH 2020 14:00 GMT+1. 

Selected ideas will be shared on the official website on 16th April. 

We look forward to receiving your submission for the challenge.

All the best,

Lorraine Davis
Regional Partnerships

Seedstars Africa

+27 671824907 (WhatsApp Only) 
<mailto:lorraine@seedstars.com|lorraine@seedstars.com>
<http://seedstars.com|seedstars.com>

Seedstars, 36 avenue Cardinal-Mermillod, Geneva, Carouge 1227, Switzerland
